attributes.action: raise awareness of recycling CDs and DVDs given away free by newspapers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Newspapers should be required to make arrangements for all unwanted CDs and DVDs given away free by themselves to readers to be recycled.  This could be through providing for these to be returned free of charge by Royal Mail and/or to provide details of local recycling plants.
